alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Grayson; Smyth; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:46PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Smyth, Wythe, western Carroll and eastern Grayson Counties and the City of Galax through 200 PM EDT... At 1245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crockett, or near Rural Retreat, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wytheville... Galax... Rural Retreat... Fries... Speedwell... Sugar Grove... and Baywood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
